articles.author: The Nation, The Nation
articles.title: Once in 400 years - Prepare for spectacular Comet Nishimura as it nears Earth - asianews.network
articles.description: Discovered a few weeks ago by Japanese astronomer Hideo Nishimura, the comet has swiftly become a sensation in the world of astronomy.
articles.content:
September 11, 2023
BANGKOK – A once-in-a-lifetime celestial event is on the horizon as Comet Nishimura, officially designated C/2023 P1 (Nishimura), graces the night sky next week, delighting astron… [+2858 chars]
